task: Implement a comprehensive smart greenhouse optimization system. Conduct a thorough evaluation of energy utilization, automate the integration of renewable energy sources, manage waste recycling, and optimize water usage. Track plant growth patterns using integrated AI for improved yield prediction, and compile an integrated sustainability report with AI-driven recommendations. Trigger alerts for system inefficiencies and forecast upcoming resource needs with predictive models.

agents.name: client_agent
agents.role: Acts as the central interface for user interactions, coordinating tasks to optimize greenhouse management.

agents.name: energy_management_agent
agents.role: Evaluates and optimizes energy consumption, focusing on sustainable resource use.

agents.name: energy_audit_agent
agents.role: Conducts comprehensive energy audits to identify inefficiencies and propose solutions.

agents.name: renewable_integration_agent
agents.role: Manages the integration of renewable energy systems into the greenhouse operations.

agents.name: solar_system_agent
agents.role: Oversees solar power systems, ensuring optimal performance and integration.

agents.name: solar_efficiency_agent
agents.role: Analyzes solar system performance for efficiency improvements.

agents.name: wind_turbine_agent
agents.role: Manages wind turbines, integrating them into the energy grid of the greenhouse.

agents.name: resource_management_agent
agents.role: Oversees resource allocation and predictive modeling for future needs.

agents.name: predictive_modeling_agent
agents.role: Develops models to forecast resource requirements and optimize supply chains.

agents.name: forecasting_agent
agents.role: Forecasts future resource needs based on current usage patterns and trends.

agents.name: trend_analysis_agent
agents.role: Analyzes long-term trends to refine predictive models and resource allocation.

agents.name: water_usage_agent
agents.role: Optimizes water usage by managing irrigation systems and detecting leaks.

agents.name: irrigation_optimizer_agent
agents.role: Adjusts irrigation schedules for the efficient use of water resources.

agents.name: leak_detection_agent
agents.role: Identifies water leaks in the greenhouse systems to prevent waste.

agents.name: repair_recommendation_agent
agents.role: Provides repair recommendations for detected leaks to ensure system integrity.

agents.name: ai_growth_monitor_agent
agents.role: Utilizes AI to monitor plant growth patterns and predict yields.

agents.name: plant_growth_analytics_agent
agents.role: Analyzes plant growth data to identify trends and issues.

agents.name: yield_prediction_agent
agents.role: Predicts future plant yields using AI models and growth data.

agents.name: growth_pattern_analyzer_agent
agents.role: Provides detailed analysis of growth patterns to inform yield forecasts.

agents.name: alert_agent
agents.role: Generates alerts for inefficiencies or unusual patterns detected in systems.

agents.name: sustainability_report_agent
agents.role: Compiles detailed sustainability reports with curated data and AI-driven insights.

agents.name: recommendation_analysis_agent
agents.role: Provides sustainability recommendations based on comprehensive report data.

agents.name: implementation_plan_agent
agents.role: Designs actionable implementation plans from recommendation analyses.

agents.name: waste_management_agent
agents.role: Oversees waste recycling and conversion into usable biomass.

agents.name: waste_recycling_agent
agents.role: Manages the recycling processes of greenhouse waste products.

agents.name: biomass_conversion_agent
agents.role: Converts organic waste into biomass energy, promoting recycling and sustainability.

agents.name: efficiency_audit_agent
agents.role: Conducts audits to ensure biomass conversion processes are efficient and effective.

tools.name: inefficiency_notification_tool
tools.description: Sends alerts via email or SMS about detected inefficiencies or anomalies.

contact_method.description: Preferred method of communication, e.g., email or SMS.

contact_details.description: Email address or phone number for receiving alerts.

tools.name: yield_optimization_tool
tools.description: Provides AI-driven insights to maximize plant yields.

health_metrics.description: Overall health score of the plant.

target_yield.description: Target yield desired by the user.

time_frame.description: Time frame for achieving target yield.
